name: Twisted Reality (ocarbone)
description:
Twisted Reality is a 2D single player cyberpunk role playing game which touches upon the effects of technology, the addiction surrounding it and how it can be used for manipulation.

It was produced via a team of three; Olivia Carbone as the Game Designer, Aramis Marcuola-Bel as the Game Programmer and Christopher Gardiner as the Audio Producer.

The controls for Twisted Reality are as follows; 

Movement:

  • Up = Up Arrow
  • Down = Down Arrow
  • Left = Left Arrow
  • Right = Right Arrow

Menu and User Interface:

  • Up = Up Arrow
  • Down = Down Arrow
  • Confirm = Z Key
  • Cancel = C Key
